January 14, 195$
Mr. B. A. Mevey, Principal
Emerson Elementary School

V7ichita, Kansas
Boar Mr. Mevey:
U of January 1, 1953, the MAEB Fact Sheets ware
incorporated in the MA3B Journal. A subscription
to that magazine is available at $4.00 per year.
If you desire to subscribe at this new priee, please
let me know by return mail.
Besides the Fadt Sheets, the Journai|contains many
articles prepared by leaders in the flSId of education
and concern utilization of radio and television for
education as well as the specific field of educational
oroadcasting. vTith the exception of June, July, August
and September, the Journal is a monthly publication.
At this time we are out of hack issues of the Fact
Sheets, but I beleive we will be reprinting some soon.
If you desire back issues, may I suggest that you write
me in the near future, and I will try to fill your
request at that time.â€™/
Sincerely,
(Mrs.)Judith B. Gans
